Prepare, execute, document, and present results of network validation tests as assigned. Reproduce and verify reported bugs as assigned. Troubleshoot hardware Configure network infrastructure in accordance with the tests in question. Remotely image systems with the OS needed for test. Create/Modify test scripts as needed for test.Update firmware with LanConf or DediProg as needed for test.Update Drivers manually or with installer as needed for test.Provide/receive technical assistance within validation team in order to ensure goals

●	Resolve cross-platform technical issues with the software over the phone, email, or remote sessions.●	Test software releases, verify functionality. ●	Log changes in software and log errors in new releases. ●	Manage Cisco VoIP●	Manage Cisco Network - Routing, Switching, ACLs, VPN, VLANs, layer 3 Switching, NAT, Cisco IOS, IPv4 and IPv6. ●	Backup/Restore company computers when needed.

●	Assign/manage team workload. Provide new hire training. Provide status updates and issue reports and documentation to project managers. Work closely with the project managers to ensure customers get desired equipment in an expedited manner. ●	Validation of systems for the purpose of demonstration to channel partners and internal engineering development teams.●	Hands on experience with current technologies: Sandy/Ivy Bridge/Haswell, Ultraooks (touchscreens), SSD/SAS/SATA, RAID (LSI, ISRT etc.), wireless/Bluetooth, fiber NIC, Network KVM, RMM, DediProg, vPro, WiDi, SOC, Firmware, Drivers, SoC, Cloud solutions, HADOOP, Cisco (UCSM, CIMC, IOS), LAN/WAN, vPro●	Full functionality test of racks, servers, workstations, desktops, laptops tablets, development platforms etc. including but not limited to the running of scripts and third party programs to ensure stability.●	Installation of Intel racks, servers, workstations, desktops, and laptops tablets development platforms etc.●	Advanced troubleshooting of Intel racks, servers, workstations, desktops, and laptops, tablets, development platforms etc.●	Advanced Repair of Intel racks, servers, workstations, desktops, and laptops, tablets.
●	Escalated Customer Service Issues●	Escalated Technical Assistance calls/emails/Tickets●	Pre-sales calls/emails/Tickets●	RMA processing●	Help Desk/Remote Sessions●	Sale of Services●	Order Processing
